---
id: delete-function
title: "DeleteFunction"
description: "Permanently removes a function from the workspace, deleting both draft and published versions along with all associated code. It fails if already in use"

sidebar_class_name: "delete api-method"

custom_edit_url: null
---

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"DeleteFunction"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/function/{function_name}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Permanently removes a function from the workspace, deleting both draft and published versions along with all associated code. It fails if already in use

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"function_name","in":"path","schema":{"type":"string"},"required":true},{"name":"x-org-id","in":"header","schema":{"type":"string"},"required":true},{"name":"x-workspace","in":"header","schema":{"type":"string"},"required":true}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"DeleteFunction 200 response"},"404":{"description":"ResourceNotFound 404 response"},"500":{"description":"InternalServerError 500 response","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"message":{"type":"string"}},"title":"InternalServerErrorResponseContent"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
